Notion 2 Anki

Privacy Protection

Some of the file handling is done on an external server to reduce the overhead. For debugging purposes your cards are logged but not perserved overtime.
You can also read the source code at alemayhu/notion2anki

Hosting

This site is being served via DigitalOcean servers. You can read their Privacy policy here https://www.digitalocean.com/legal/privacy-policy/

Error Reporter

This site uses Sentry for crash reports. You can read their Privacy policy here https://sentry.io/privacy/

Analytics

In order to better understand the usage (number of visitors) of the site and how to better serve users, Google Analytics is used.See their privacy policy here https://policies.google.com
